description:
Kondou Kenji is a good-looking young man who doesn`t try to hide who he is - in his opinion school exists for the girls, not the studies. Kenji`s mother, Akino, is a school maths teacher.
Kenji sees Kazuki as his rival, but Kazuki does not see him in the same way. Even so, Kenji often challenges Kazuki to various things but is beaten more often than not.
name: Kondou Kenji
